entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: Parvati Patil is a student mentioned in the conversation about Defense Against the Dark Arts O.W.L. She expresses incredulity at Professor Umbridge's statement that they will not practice spells before their exam.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a teacher mentioned in the conversation. She dismissively responds to Parvati Patil's question about practicing spells, stating that theory is enough.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student mentioned in the conversation. He expresses frustration at Professor Umbridge's response and questions her about being prepared for the real world.

relationships.description: Parvati Patil questions Professor Umbridge about practicing spells before their exam.
Harry Potter questions Professor Umbridge about being prepared for the real world and her statement that there is nothing waiting out there.
Parvati Patil and Harry Potter share a concern about Professor Umbridge's response to their questions.
